adv: Honestly, I did not see any advantage other than me not having to 'create' the visualization
disadv:
Most of the recommendations were unnecessarily adding a third attribute in the visualization which was not helpful especially when the question required to be answered based on only 2 attributes.

None of the specified or recommended visualization had average aggregation!

There was a lot of overlap between the marks using color encoding which made it very difficult to make sense out of it
comment: I would have liked some more control on creating the visualizations rather than just choosing what to visualize - like the aggregation to be performed, the encodings to be used, etc.
